tooltip.cfm.compact_fishmsg: When you catch something, whether shows more compact catching chat messages.
tooltip.cfm.trevor_opener: Whether receives chat messages when TreasureOpenEvent is active.
tooltip.cfm.record_overlay: Whether shows fishing record panel in your screen.
option.cfm.always_shows: Show Panel Without Being on Islands
tooltip.cfm.augment_overlay: Whether shows equipped line&bait and switched overclocks
